extends Object

getContext

public PhotoContext getContext(String photoId,
                               String userId)
                        throws IOException,
                               org.json.JSONException,
                               FlickrException
Returns next and previous favorites for a photo in a user's favorites.

Parameters:
photoId - The id of the photo to fetch the context for.
userId - The user who counts the photo as a favorite.
Returns:
an instance of PhotoContext
Throws:
IOException
org.json.JSONException
FlickrException

getList

public PhotoList getList(String userId,
                         Date minFaveDate,
                         Date maxFaveDate,
                         int perPage,
                         int page,
                         Set<String> extras)
                  throws IOException,
                         FlickrException,
                         org.json.JSONException
Get the collection of favorites for the calling user or the specified user ID.

Parameters:
userId - The optional user ID. Null value will be ignored.
minFaveDate - The optional minimum date that a photo was favorited on.
maxFaveDate - The optional maximum date that a photo was favorited on.
perPage - The optional per page value. Values <= 0 will be ignored.
page - The page to view. Values <= 0 will be ignored.
extras - a Set Strings representing extra parameters to send
Returns:
The Collection of Photo objects
Throws:
IOException
org.json.JSONException
FlickrException
See Also:
Extras

getPublicList

public PhotoList getPublicList(String userId,
                               Date minFaveDate,
                               Date maxFaveDate,
                               int perPage,
                               int page,
                               Set<String> extras)
                        throws IOException,
                               FlickrException,
                               org.json.JSONException
Get the specified user IDs public contacts. This method does not require authentication.

Parameters:
userId - The user ID
minFaveDate - The optional minimum date that a photo was favorited on.
maxFaveDate - The optional maximum date that a photo was favorited on.
perPage - The optional per page value. Values <= 0 will be ignored.
page - The optional page to view. Values <= 0 will be ignored
extras - A Set of extra parameters to send
Returns:
A Collection of Photo objects
Throws:
IOException
FlickrException
org.json.JSONException
See Also:
Extras
